unnormalised: **Brand Collabs: Influencers Serving Up More Than Just Selfies This Festive Season**
normalised: **Brand Collaborations: Influencers Serving Up More Than Just Selfies This Festive Season**

unnormalised: Hey there, social media junkies! Looks like brand collaborations are hitting a fever pitch as we gear up for Onam! Remember when influencers just posted pretty pictures? Those days are so over. Now it's all about *integrated experiences*.
normalised: Hey there, social media junkies! Looks like brand collaborations are hitting a fever pitch as we gear up for Onam! Remember when influencers just posted pretty pictures? Those days are so over. Now it's all about *integrated experiences*.

unnormalised: We’re seeing collabs everywhere, from fashion brands teaming up with lifestyle gurus to promote the latest kurtis near Chandni Chowk, to food bloggers whipping up biryani recipes using specific spice blends.
normalised: We’re seeing collaborations everywhere, from fashion brands teaming up with lifestyle gurus to promote the latest kurtis near Chandni Chowk, to food bloggers whipping up biryani recipes using specific spice blends.

unnormalised: Even Amrita from IIT Delhi is now the face of a new coding boot camp, talking about her career journey on Instagram!
normalised: Even Amrita from I I T Delhi is now the face of a new coding boot camp, talking about her career journey on Instagram!

unnormalised: Expect to see a spike in these partnerships as brands battle for your attention during the festive spending spree. It's reported that brands are willing to shell out anywhere from Rs. 50,000 to Rs. 5 Lakhs per post for the right influencer, depending on their reach and engagement.
normalised: Expect to see a spike in these partnerships as brands battle for your attention during the festive spending spree. It's reported that brands are willing to shell out anywhere from rupee fifty thousand to rupee five lakh per post for the right influencer, depending on their reach and engagement.

unnormalised: But here's the tea: authenticity is key. Consumers are getting smarter, and they can smell a forced collaboration from a km away!
normalised: But here's the tea: authenticity is key. Consumers are getting smarter, and they can smell a forced collaboration from a kilometer away!

unnormalised: The trend is expected to grow 15% in the next quarter.
normalised: The trend is expected to grow fifteen percent in the next quarter.

unnormalised: So, keep an eye out and see what innovative (and maybe not-so-innovative) campaigns roll out! Happy scrolling!
normalised: So, keep an eye out and see what innovative (and maybe not-so-innovative) campaigns roll out! Happy scrolling!
